Teach FOP to start from any dir on NT/2000/XP like Ant

text:
Applied, thanks. Good idea.

Can this be done for Unix as well and does it make sense?

Yes, it can be done for Unix.
I think Ant start script may be a good example to borrow that too,
at 
a quick glance I see   

  progname=`basename "$0"`

to find the full path to the script...
